import React,{Component}from"react";import Burger from"../../components/Burger";import BuildControls from"../../components/BuildControls";import Modal from"../../components/General/Modal";import OrderSummary from"../../components/OrderSummary";//un hezee c oorclgdq ucir
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const INGTREDIENT_PRICE={salad:1500,cheese:1000,bacon:5000,meat:8000};const INGTREDIENT_NAME={bacon:"Гахайн мах",cheese:"Бяслаг",meat:"Үхрийн мах",salad:"Салад"};//Dotroo state hadgaldag class torlin component
//ucir n orts zereg ym hadgalna
class BurgerPage extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={ingredients:{bacon:0,cheese:0,meat:0,salad:0},totalPrice:1000,purchasing:false,confirmOrder:false};this.continueOrder=()=>{console.log("snn,,sm,s");};this.showConfirmModal=()=>{this.setState({confirmOrder:true});};this.closeConfirmModal=()=>{this.setState({confirmOrder:false});};//setState deer huucin obectyg zaalt orj irwel shineer render hidgu
this.addIngredient=type=>{// ... buyu spread operator ar talin objectyg zadlaad shiner yg adilhn bicn
const newIngredients={...this.state.ingredients};if(this.state.ingredients[type]!==5){newIngredients[type]++;const newPrice=this.state.totalPrice+INGTREDIENT_PRICE[type];this.setState({purchasing:true,totalPrice:newPrice,ingredients:newIngredients});}};this.minusIngredient=type=>{const newIngredients={...this.state.ingredients};if(this.state.ingredients[type]!==0){newIngredients[type]--;const newPrice=this.state.totalPrice-INGTREDIENT_PRICE[type];this.setState({purchasing:newPrice>1000,totalPrice:newPrice,ingredients:newIngredients});}};}render(){const disabledIngredientsMinus={...this.state.ingredients};const disabledIngredientsAdd={...this.state.ingredients};//object dotor bdag propertygaar datwalt hiih
for(let key in disabledIngredientsMinus){disabledIngredientsMinus[key]=disabledIngredientsMinus[key]===0;}for(let key in disabledIngredientsAdd){disabledIngredientsAdd[key]=disabledIngredientsAdd[key]===5;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{closeConfirmModal:this.closeConfirmModal,show:this.state.confirmOrder,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OrderSummary,{onCancel:this.closeConfirmModal,onContinue:this.continueOrder,price:this.state.totalPrice,ingredientsName:INGTREDIENT_NAME,ingredients:this.state.ingredients})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Burger,{ingredients:this.state.ingredients}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BuildControls,{showConfirmModal:this.showConfirmModal,ingredientsName:INGTREDIENT_NAME,disabledPurchasing:!this.state.purchasing,price:this.state.totalPrice,disabledIngredientsMinus:disabledIngredientsMinus,disabledIngredientsAdd:disabledIngredientsAdd,addIngredient:this.addIngredient,minusIngredient:this.minusIngredient})]});}}export default BurgerPage;
